attributes.action: To Honour Donald Trump with a KBE for services to free thinking.
attributes.background: Donald Trump has shown great courage and vision in offering an alternate route of free thinking and prompt implementation of policies for political parties in modern democracies and for doing so, should be recognised with a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
